/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a tree-lined street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow on the scene. The trees, lush and green, line both sides of the road, their leaves forming a natural canopy overhead. A white car is parked on the right side of the road, adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise tranquil setting. On the left side of the road, a street lamp stands tall, ready to illuminate the area as dusk falls. The image beautifully encapsulates a typical day in Beijing, where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
